title: Andrew Cuomo blasts far left Dems for being soft on crime, harming minorities they claim to represent
description: Former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo slammed the far left for being soft on crime, arguing progressives are hurting the very people they claim to represent.

title: Homecoming: DeSantis family visits Florida first lady's elementary school, favorite burger joint in Ohio
description: The DeSantis family visited First Lady Casey DeSantis' hometown in Troy, Ohio on Thursday, visiting her elementary school and visiting a local diner she frequented.

title: Billy Joel Madison Square Garden show rescheduled during NBA, NHL playoffs at arena
description: With the New York Rangers and Knicks alternating playoff games over a four-day stretch at Madison Square Garden, Billy Joel was forced to push back an upcoming concert.

title: Pelicans’ David Griffin on how to make Zion Williamson more available: ‘A big part is on him’
description: New Orleans vice president of basketball operations David Griffin said there is "a lot" Zion Williamson can do to remain healthy and be more available.

title: Georgia preteen drowns in Pensacola rip tide during Florida spring break trip
description: 12-year-old Rashad Williams passed away after being caught in a rip current in Pensacola, Florida with Braylon Jones. The Georgia boy was visiting the beach for spring break.

title: Former Dodger Cody Bellinger gets pitch clock violation while LA crowd gives him standing ovation in return
description: Cubs outfielder Cody Bellinger got a standing ovation from Dodgers fans in his return to Los Angeles, and it resulted in a pitch clock violation.

title: Man shot in head in Los Angeles' Hollywood tourist district: police
description: A man was shot in Los Angeles' Hollywood tourist district on Friday night after intervening in a fight between a male and female suspect, who fled on foot after the shooting.

title: Atlanta woman accidentally shoots herself during struggle with brother: police
description: A Georgia woman accidentally shot herself twice in the head after getting into a struggle with her brother, who tried to disarm her. Atlanta Police Department is investigating.

title: Maryland shuts down day care center where employee allegedly filmed herself abusing children
description: The Maryland government shut down a day care center where an employee is alleged to have abused two children while filming the incidents.

title: Nadler dismisses 'essentially fraudulent' claims from Republicans about crime in NYC
description: Rep. Jerry Nadler, D-N.Y., says he will dispel GOP claims that crime is on the rise in New York City as he defends Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg at a House Judiciary field hearing next week.

title: Twins manager ejected after umpires leave Yankees pitcher in game following sticky substance check
description: Rocco Baldelli was ejected on Saturday after umpires allowed Domingo German to stay in the game after an extensive sticky substance check.

title: 'Runaway fireball' could be alien probe that crashed off coast of Papua New Guinea: Harvard scientist
description: Harvard Professor Avi Loeb, who started the Galileo Project to investigate UFOs, will search for pieces of an "interstellar object" that could be alien probe or artifact

title: Lincoln Project advisor goes to MSNBC to blast Tim Scott as a ‘racial security blanket,’ ‘pacifier’ for GOP
description: During an MSNBC segment, The Lincoln Project senior advisor Tara Setmayer called Sen. Tim Scott, R-S.C., the GOP's "racial pacifier."

title: Donald Trump Jr. opposes Bud Light boycott, citing company's donations to Republicans

title: North Carolina murder suspect turns himself back in after being released by mistake
description: A murder suspect in North Carolina turned himself back in on Saturday after he was erroneously released on Saturday from the Mecklenburg County Detention Center.

title: Texas police address fears of serial killer after second missing man found dead in Austin lake

title: Reddit users support woman who told her sister about their grandmother's 'hated' birth name

title: Scientists find concerning bird flu mutations, but US health officials say threat to humans is low

title: China says it 'hopes and believes' Germany will support its 'peaceful reunification' with Taiwan
description: A top Chinese government diplomat expressed hope that Germany will support its "peaceful reunification" with Taiwan.

title: Train carrying hazardous materials derails in rural Maine, residents warned to 'stay clear'

description: White Sox pitcher Mike Clevinger made his home debut on Friday and walked out to the mound to "Gold Digger" by Kanye West in a 6-3 loss to the Baltimore Orioles.

title: Fingerprint-activated 9mm handgun coming to market

title: NYT military journalist rips his employer after exposing leaker: We would have protected him If he came to us

title: 3 Americans go missing on sailing voyage from Mexico to San Diego

title: On this day in history, April 15, 1865, President Abraham Lincoln passes away
description: President Abraham Lincoln died on this day, April 15, 1865, about nine hours after he was shot by actor John Wilkes Booth. Lincoln and his wife had been watching a play at Ford's Theatre in D.C.
